subject: Gold Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Five players on Mexico’s national team tested positive for the banned stimulant clenbuterol and were removed from the squad playing in the Concacaf Gold Cup, the Mexican soccer federation said.
snippet: Five players on Mexico’s national team tested positive for the banned stimulant clenbuterol and were removed from the squad playing in the Concacaf Gold Cup, the Mexican soccer federation said.
